thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: N Smith
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by N Smith

author: N Smith
title: N Smith
text:
Saddled with $60K credit card debt i knew i needed professional help. The quality of my life had deteriorated; sleepless nights and constant stress became the norm.
At first i was hesitant, but as i sat with with Ashley (finch Location) and discussed my financial situation i felt a weight lifted. After thoroughly reviewing my situation, Ashley told me that i could file for consumer protection. Her patience, knowledge of the subject matter and compassion along with a high level of professionalism has lifted me out of my darkest moment.
I have learnt how to manage my money and to say no.
I can now focus on my family and happily look forward to the day that i am debt free. Thank you Ashley for you help, i will be eternally grateful.
